error.nothing_enabled: None of the contracts have been selected to be added to the system.
error.contracts_missing: The user has no contracts to add.
error.partial_offline:
Mosoblgaz service has been suspended for temporary technical work.
Please try to set up later.
error.api_error: An error occurred while exchanging data with the Mosoblgaz API. Error data is available in the log.

user.description: Enter your login details for your Mosoblgaz account. By default, all accounts linked to your user will be added.
user.title: Mosoblgaz Login

Choose options for contract no. {{ code }}.
Disabling contract option will completely disable the contract!
contract.title: Contract no. {{ code }}
